author: Hemant Mehta
title: The Vaccine That Causes Autism Has Finally Found Its Proper Home
text:
« Another Oregon Baby is Dead After Her Faith-Healing Mother Didn’t Get Medical Help in Time About Hemant Mehta 
Hemant Mehta is the editor of Friendly Atheist, appears on the Atheist Voice channel on YouTube, and co-hosts the uniquely-named Friendly Atheist Podcast . You can read much more about him here .
